original_text: Instead, you must worship only the Lord. He is the one who used his great power to bring you safely out of Egypt. Bend down low to give him honour. Offer sacrifices to him.
korean_text: 오직 큰 능력과 편 팔로 너희를 애굽에서 인도하여 내신 여호와만 경외하여 그를 예배하며 그에게 제사를 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: Instead, you must worship only the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 당신은 오직 주님만 경배해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: to bring you safely out of Egypt.
Bend down low to give him honour.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 존경을 표하기 위해 몸을 숙이세요.
